fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: -Unraise the living, dealing an astral overkill attack to them. This is done by the gods and not you therefore you didn’t kill them

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Your ability only affects roles Retributionist (61) wouldn’t normally be able to use
-This is mechanically a town role in every way except win condition

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: See the good faction lose (May win while dead)
